# To add new blocks, you also need to update blockTypeMap in Block::blockTypeMap
# For special block (e.g. transparent, animatable...), update the corresponding set in block.cpp
# Each block is followed by 6 uv coords (bottom-left) of face with corresponding direction with the following order
# XPOS, XNEG, YPOS, YNEG, ZPOS, ZNEG
# Every direction is written in one line, and x and y are separated by the space " "
# the program would ignore empty line and line that starts with #

# 14 18 20 24
# 2 18 8 24
# 8 24 14 30
# 14 24 20 30
# 8 18 14 24
# 20 18 26 24
